title: Quick reminder, for just about everyone playing One-For-All right now.

replies.body: one for all is 90% cancer and 10% fun, for me atleast

This seems to be the case for all "Fun Modes".

Fun until those 3-4 Guys realizes or even research whats broken to abuse the mode and you until its labeled Cancer.

Happened for me to URF, happened to One for All.

Honestly the only Fun Mode thats still Fun is Ascension.

I personally disagree. I could keep playing URF all day long, despite facing a bunch of Zeds, Wukongs, Shacos and whatnot. I would play Poro King over ranked/normals/ARAM any time. Ascension is pretty alright. But in OfA I almost always either feel like there's nothing I can do and get tilted, or it doesn't matter what I do because our champion pretty much auto-wins. None of the modes feel any more cancerous than League in general, except OfA.

Only reason i enjoy poro king more than aram is that you can pick champ tbh.
Honestly just give us aram but with champ select as a game mode rito
(no dont it probs wouldnt be popular enough and you'd remove it)

Same here. As it is now, URF is my favourite mode by far, but simply removing the Poro King from Poro King would put it on par. Unless they also made URF non-random again, making it my indisputable nr. 1.
it's true, that 10% is hilarious tho
yeah, but those 90% quickly made me prefer playing boring ol' draft pick over OfA
yes she is a treacherous whore, but we always come running back
I'd rather 2 for 1 mode where everyone picks two champs and can swap them with a sum spell
http://forevertwentysomethings.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/giphy-7.gif
Until you experience the {{champion:28}} {{champion:99}}  combo.

I'd combo eve and lux 

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
You think that isn't hot?
I'm more into the {{champion:44}} {{champion:81}} duo myself.
Nah, {{champion:28}} {{champion:202}} is where it's at.
That meme is so old...

> [{quoted}](name=T3H UB3RN07,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=gvAN9QEA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-06T14:45:13.876+0000)
>
> I'd rather 2 for 1 mode where everyone picks two champs and can swap them with a sum spell

ngl thats genius.  have them share the same items or same gold pool, could also do it where they switch on death?

> [{quoted}](name=I Main Swain,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=gvAN9QEA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-04-07T02:06:40.802+0000)
>
> ngl thats genius.  have them share the same items or same gold pool, could also do it where they switch on death?

ci papi

I actually thought gold pool because it's more open than forcing every riven to be fiora and every vayne to be also draven

The sum spell being short CD like... nidalee/elise level short cd, was pretty important. so you can set up combos if you get good... that one guy out there who only plays Ivern or Rengar would be happy for that idea at least... especially since now he gets both ivern and rengar on one map 

I had some overblown idea of making it a  12 player/6 team of 2 weird king of the hill mode on a xxxxxxxxxxx not gonna go into it further but yeah the main gimmick was making it so you had the ability to swap between another champ and FITE with some other stuff in the mode to kinda... allow a bit of diversity
You should have them both have seperate gold. Or share the same items. Otherwise people would only play 1 as having two would be disadvantageous.

I mean, I got a nunu game. We lost horribly.

Yet, just somehow... we still enjoyed the game.
Ya just got to meme and not care what color the endgame screen is.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=gvAN9QEA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-06T15:09:05.624+0000)

honestly nunu in one for all is really funny...for the team playing nunu
{{champion:27}}

{{champion:57}} vs {{champion:143}} was fun.
Garden warfare
{{champion:145}} Tanks? I can deal with that given consistent distance. Assassins? They aren't allowed to get close.
Honestly the point is fun and I don't care if we don't win. I just don't want to play Fizz literally every game. And then the one game your champion finally wins, someone dodges.
Kai'Sa vs Maokai
Played rammus vs Alistar. Was one of my most favorite matches so far.

Most fun I had was getting {{champion:19}}
